(Excuse me lizards, they are ion disks, i-o-n, not iron.  So, if they hit you 
in the arm, they would drill until they got past the armor, and hit your 
internal stuff (under the armor).  So, either do your little "change it so 
nothing happens" or take proper damage, and read more carefully please)

Manterror/Injector/Double Punch:


Double Punch, a little angry sidestepped to the right 5 feet, not wanting to 
give away his position by standing in the same place and firing like an 
idiot.  Raising his pincher once more, it hit together a few times, opening, 
two missiles fired at Quickstrike's left knee.


Manterror jumped back five feet, dodging the dive by Mantella easily.  
Ducking under her spin kick, he fired two ion disks at her left knee, and two 
at her chest (two from each ion disk shooter-thingy that they gave no 
description for in the profile attached to his arms).


Injector laughed.  "How utterly pathetic." he said, raising his stinger 
missile launcher, firing off three missiles at Mantella's abdomen.
